title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "The Wanderer" by Alain Fournier, New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in brown, grey and dark green ink on off-white shiny wove paper
signed: Signed in printed black ink, lower right: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed vertically in dark green ink, spine: THE WANDERER ALAIN-FOURNIER; printed horizontally in white, spine lower margin within green square: NC 16.

Printed in white ink, front cover lower left within leaf: the WANDERER; lower right: Alain-Fournier.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Bookjacket design. Design features ground consisting of thin horizontal strips of various patterns rendered in black, white, and orange. Patterns, which consist of thin horizontal lines, tight scribbles, crosses, hatch marks, short horizontal lines, circles, and dots, are reminiscent of layers of sedimentary rock or an aerial view of farm fields. Cover depicts, on lower left, a black, horizontally-oriented three-lobed leaf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "The Wanderer" by Alain Fournier, New Directions Books", 1947.
1947. Lithography in brown, grey and dark green ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-165-7.
